name: unretouched
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An unretouched picture, photograph, etc. has not been retouched (= had small changes made to improve it): We can tell you that the photo was unretouched. I think people need to see the unretouched original images.
More examplesFewer examplesAnybody who saw the unretouched photographs of the bombing will know that this is not hyperbole. It shows frank, unretouched photos of exuberant young women of all sizes, shapes, and colours. The novel is an unretouched yet touching portrait of a woman, a man, and a city in flux.
